title: Scientists discover cosmic 'scar' in interstellar clouds left by a close shave between our sun and 2 intruder stars
description: "It’s kind of a jigsaw puzzle where all the different pieces are moving."
content: "It’s kind of a jigsaw puzzle where all the different pieces are moving."
